article_title: Top healthcare finance data stories, resources of 2015
article_text:
Healthcare Finance by the numbers

From hospital rankings to employment data, sometimes the numbers tell best the story of healthcare's biggest challenges. Follow this list for the latest charts, tables and maps compiled by Healthcare Finance to help you see the bigger picture.

Advance to next slide to start gallery.
